website_summaries.verdict: As with the original Slingbox Pro, most of this will be overkill for the majority of users who just want to stream their live TV or DVR to their PC or smart phone. But for home-cinema enthusiasts and hard-core gadget heads, the Slingbox Pro-HD may well be worth it.
pros: Variety of devices compatible with it
controls almost all cable and satellite boxes and DVRs
good video quality via the Internet
cons: monopolises most AV sources during viewing
best video quality requires ample bandwidth and muscular PC

customer_reviews.title: a treasure
customer_reviews.text: Wow , looks like the dealer found a brand new unit in somebody's warehouse or abandoned store . It is a treasure but a shame Slingbox does not manufacture it anymore. It had factory seals and worked right out of the box. I could not be happier .
customer_reviews.author: movie freak

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The Slingbox Pro-HD died on me after only 4 months. Amazon return policy is only one month according to the message I got when I hit the Return button. I would not recommend this product. Even before it died, the quality of the audio and video was worthless away from home. The only decent quality I could get was in my own house when I did not have to go over the internet. I know there are technical requirements for use over the internet, but I found that all the places I tried it got the same result, poor quality. So unless you have high bandwidth on both the sending and receiving ends, don't expect HD type results.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox regrets
customer_reviews.text: I am now the owner of not one piece of crap but two. Slingbox solo and Slingbox ProHD after 90days of technical help no one has been able to get the pro HD running . Much to my regret I purchased the ProHD after unsatisfactory capabilities of the Slingbox Solo were realized. Not being able to watch separate channel. The PRO HD and support of Slingbox technical has been one nightmare I wish I had passed on.Not only gettting the units to work has been an act of frustration but even atempting to purchase the extended warranty has been an act of futility .I would never go through this again.I will forego TV watching first.
customer_reviews.author: Becton3

customer_reviews.title: Great once it works...
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI, I could *NOT* get the slingbox to get an IP address with my Linksys WRT54GL. Luckily I have my vonage router on the network that could work with the Slingbox. This was a long frustrating process to figure that out. Slingbox support is just awful, they would not offer any help until I could fax in my invoice from amazon to show proof of purchase to get the short 90 day "complimentary" support. That being said, once everything is configured, the slingbox works great! The mobile app for android is awesome, but cost an additional $29.99. This sadly is really worth the extra cost because having mobile tv anywhere at anytime is a nice reward.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Slinging to HK
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install following step by step. Brother in Hong Kong is now able to watch his alma mater Alabama play on Saturdays. The Slingbox software recognized my provider - uverse - and the remote icon brings up the same remote I have. It functions same as the real one. Only glitch was Slingbox request an RJ45 jack from modem. Didn't have any open so ordered the egenius network adapter for the PC and in a minute I was online and had an open RJ45 jack. If you don't have a wifi capable modem and no open jacks I suppose this could be fixed by installing a RJ45 switch box. Bottom Line very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: anymouse65

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It takes your media and passes it to another sling box using your network. If some one on the network is moving a file, it becomes very jerking and looses frames. It's supposed to also allow you to view your media on a table or smart phone using their $30 app. I could never get the app to work. so that was $30 down the tubes. The resolution is poor and the frame rate is very susceptible to any network traffic. I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality Control!
customer_reviews.text: Was nice when it worked. My first unit lasted about a year. Died right after waranty expired. Ordered another, it lasted 3 months. Was replaced under warranty. The next one lasted 2 months. replaced under waranty and sold. Thats 3 in less than two years!!! Ive done some reading around the internet and it seems they all have very bad reliability issues. Check for yourself. As far as customer service, after 60 days you can stand on your head! I now have a Vulkano. Paid $88.00. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, let me say what's wrong with this item. Streaming online is imperfect and changing channels doesn't always work. It's the same problem with the ipad app. Sometimes if the internet connection isn't great, the streaming is horribly pixelated. But aside from that, this is one of the most amazing devices I've ever used. Being able to watch cable from anywhere in the world that has an internet connection cannot be described. I love it so much. I know in time their website and ipad app will work better, but even with that in mind, it's still an amazing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Garrell

customer_reviews.title: Great tech but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved it while it worked. My first unit failed after a few weeks; the manufacturer replaced it, and my second unit lasted long enough to fail out of warranty. I saw multiple reviewers warn that their units had failed, but there was nothing else like it on the market, so I took a chance. For something that costs $250 it's horribly unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: DValve

customer_reviews.title: I like this because I use it for remote testing of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this because I use it for remote testing of Cable TV Set Top box work. I can attach three different set top boxes to the three different inputs (Component HD, SVideo, Coax) and remotely select which input I need to access. I have a network accessible power strip/switch to individually power cycle the set tops remotely and I can run my whole testing rig at my desk at work from my home office.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leiphart

customer_reviews.title: Was great, thens topped working
customer_reviews.text: Got mine 1 year + 2 weeks ago. Worked fine. Used it maybe 20 times over that time period. Then last week, it stopped working. It wouldn't maintain an ethernet connection. Tried all kinds of troubleshooting. Now it won't even power one. After doing some research online, turns out tons of people have had issues with the capacitors in these boxes (the Pro HD's and the Solo's). Now they want $30 to open a support incident (i.e., to call them), and $150 for a replacement refurb box. If you're buying a Pro HD know what you're getting in to - be aware that you box may only last a year and you'll have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: James Bellanca

customer_reviews.title: OMFG! Where have you been my whole life?
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had the Slingbox PRO-HD the day it came out. This is an amazing product. I work a lot, like to take vacations, and love my Baseball & TV shows so therein lies the problem. Not anymore. I am able to watch all broadcasted San Francisco Giants games in HD, access my DVR, Live HDTV, and all of Comcast's unbeatable OnDemand library on my Windows Phone, Kindle Fire, and any web browser. I'm now up to date on all my favorite shows and never miss a game. Slingbox PRO-HD is the greatest invention since coitus.
customer_reviews.author: beardicorn

customer_reviews.title: Best option for out of town NFL Games
customer_reviews.text: I use the slingbox so that I can watch my home town NFL team. I set up the sling at a family member's house. The nice thing is that the sling pro has its own tuner. Thus, I just plug the cable directly into it- I don't have to use a cable box. TIP Even though I have the sling connected to cable, I selected the input as an antenna. This allows me to get a free over the air HD signal instead of the SD signal that comes with the cable company. I guess the cable works as an antenna too?
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Second Slingbox - Upgrade Deal Right Now Online
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Slingbox, I previously had a Pro with the HDConnect module. I wanted the ability to attach to a second tuner on the set-top box, and the ATSC tuner. Piece of cake to set up, works great on my iPhone, iPad, and wired and wireless computers. I can only stream to one device right now, but I'm working on that. You can get the Slingbox Pro on their website, as an "upgrade" for $50 off, free shipping, which makes the price $249. I don't know how long this offer will continue, probably through the holidays. And you don't have to send in your old one, you keep it. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: but after 3 Slingbox failures and dealing with their horrible software, I'm done with this company/brand
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk that fails early. I want to live this technology, but after 3 Slingbox failures and dealing with their horrible software, I'm done with this company/brand.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedyBrad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! It just plain works!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a lot of technology items that do not deliver on the promise. Well, Slingbox is not one of those. It was easy to set up and it works every time. I have been three states away from home but still able to watch saved programs off the DVR as well as just browse local channels. I'm also able to watch cable channels such as CNBC with only high-speed internet connection here. I have been very pleasingly surprised at how well the Slingbox works.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Sling Box Pro HD
customer_reviews.text: I waited a year to buy this device partly because of some new entrants onto the market. After carefully evaluating the other units I selected the SlingBox ProHD. I travel the entire world and follow various sports as well as certain Shows. Since I am gone so much this device allows me to feel at home wherever my Laptop has a Wifi connection. The product quality is excellent the picture quality is dependent on the speed of the WiFi connection. There are other advantages to this product especially if you own several homes you won't need cable in multiple locations.
customer_reviews.author: AfterBurner

customer_reviews.title: Slingboxes have Bad Capacitors that bulge and leak Electrolyte - Beware
customer_reviews.text: Please think twice before getting a Slingbox. My Pro-HD stopped being able to connect a couple months ago and nothing I did seemed to help. After some google searching and visiting placeshiftingenthusiasts.com, it turns out that Slingbox Solos and Pro-HDs are made with substandard capacitors that bulge after a while of use. Conveniently, this is usually after the one year warranty. The customer service is terrible because it is non-existent. The company needs to be investigated in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: MuzicEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 4 Months
customer_reviews.text: I recommend buying from an authorized dealer and not this seller. My sling box was defective after 4 months and the sellers return policy is only for 2 months. Since they are not an authorized dealer, I also do not have the option of getting a replacement directly from Sling media. On the other hand, I have another sling box that I purchased directly from Sling Media and have had no issues for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Product is expensive but you get what you pay for, it works. Even using the Windows Phone app on my 3g phone works. 3g is slow but after loading the video looks good. It does not support HDMI, which does not matter. You can use a HDMI connection for your TV and a non-HDMI connection to the Slingbox. That's assuming your Satellite/Cable box supports simultaneous output. My Dish Network Hopper does.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: One of the Most Useful things we own
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats the Slingbox. The new model pushes ads on whatever device you're watching your slingbox from. So loves of Slingbox HD - stock up on these as long as you can find them.
customer_reviews.author: Paddy

customer_reviews.title: 3 months later, a deadbox
customer_reviews.text: Got it in February. It was great. I was playing shows from my satelite box almost everywhere I go. Today, 3 months later, the box has no more light. Initially, I thought maybe the power got loosen or something. So I started checking the power adaptor, it's working fine when I plugged a different device to it. I used a different power adaptor to it (5Volts with 3amp rating) to the device. No lights and response from the box. I am very upset with the device now. I have already paid a good $260 for it. To add salt to the wound, I bought apps for both iphone and ipad costing me $30 each! ;(
customer_reviews.author: Kee Hui Wong

customer_reviews.title: great piece of technology
customer_reviews.text: installation was faily easy. love it. i use it mostly to view on my phone. quality as good as your provider. i use sprint which is ok. if you connect a cable/satellite box to it make sure no one else watches it otherwise you will be fighting with someone with the remote so you need an extra box. can't complain though i just wish sprint would throttle it up a bit, its tough getting a good signal at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: terranova

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and works well
customer_reviews.text: I have this hooked up to my Directv and basic cable at home. The only thing I don't like about it is that every time I switch from DIrectv to cable I have to do a channel scan which takes several minutes. It would have been nice if the unit's memory would keep the past scan, instead of me having to re-do the same scan every time if I want to watch basic cable. Otherwise, it's a nice unit and very easy to operate. The picture quality is more than adequate and I like watching my baseball games when I am on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Poe

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for someone living in China
customer_reviews.text: I have heard about slingbox but I never thought that this was something that I need until I move abroad to China. Althought, internet connections are limited here (speed and sites), the TV is even worse. I got a Slingbox and plug-it to my cable in Brazil, the connection is routed thru US and got here, I am downloaded it in Shanghai. The connection range on 400kbps, and I still got a decent SD image. Great product, specially when you link with a DVR.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Shiroma

customer_reviews.title: Sling Media Slingbox Pro-HD SB300-100
customer_reviews.text: I am a longtime customer of Slingbox; had to add this slingbox because my IPad wasn't supported on my older model. Didn't rate customer support because I haven't needed their help. The unit worked out of the box and when I used the web set-up application it upgraded the firmware. I use a static IP on my network and has been working flawlessly for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mark English

customer_reviews.title: Great product crippled by horrible support
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is nice and setup is straight forward. However, the support from this company is abysmal. They have a huge lag with browser support (Firefox 5 and Chrome are not supported) and the iOS applications are terribly buggy. If you intend to buy one of these be sure to read through the forums and know all of the limitations. Definitely not a customer focused company.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jantze

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox is Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sling box, I ordered this one and while waiting on shipping I decided to get the Slingbox 500. I am glad that I upgraded to the newest version with HDMI and WiFi. At the end of the day Sling Box is a great product and I don't why I waited so long to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Jgmsailor

customer_reviews.title: Installed in Japan and watching here in the US........
customer_reviews.text: I installed the slingbox at my mother inlaws office in Japan about 18 months ago so my wife and kids could watch Japanese TV. It has worked almost perfectly throughout and we watch it at least 4 or 5 times a week. Had to ask my mother inlaw to reboot it once in 18 months!! BTW, we have it connected to a Japanese DVD player that is supported by slingplayer and mostly watch recorded programs. I was expecting more problems after reading other reviews, but have been pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazhopper

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox
customer_reviews.text: The Slingbox is great to use once you've figured out how. The biggest issue is figuring out where to put it. Without wi-fi it needs to be near a tv cable outlet and modem/router. The set-up was tedious, but once it works it has been great. High quality video and sound. Able to watch virtually anywhere. Just wonder if it will be obsolete when cable and Fios begin there own streaming services.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I had the previous Slingbox (non-HD) and used it for three years. I watch the financial channel CNBC every day at the office and I avoid the monthly fees of $78 to get a cable connection into my office. This HD version is clearer and a bigger image on the screen. Additionally, my college age children are out of state and they enjoy watching Nuggets and Rockies games on their computers at school. One has an iPad with the slingbox app so he can watch TV on the go. It works also on smartphones but we have not tried it there.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox Pro HD review
customer_reviews.text: Really I can't tell the difference when watching my TV if the broadcast is from my cable or the Slingbox. When watching fast action sports, maybe I can tell a little difference, but still much better then not watching my favorite team at all. A couple of thing to consider. If you want to watch HD, you will need an upload speed of at least 2mb. Overall, a great system.
customer_reviews.author: Lorita J. Kniesly

customer_reviews.title: Mac supported not as great as Windows
customer_reviews.text: Update: Sept 2011: I've owned this product for over 8 months now. I use it every single day and it has eliminated the need for me to buy a second TV to put in my bedroom or kitchen. Where ever my Macbook Pro, Iphone 4, or Ipad 2 goes, I have TV. My router (Cisco Linksys) streams nicely from the Slingbox at 8 megabits of HD from anywhere in my small 1200 sqft house. I would give this product 5 stars instead of 4 if the Mac software had caching (allowing you to pause the video when watching it on your Mac). The PC Slingplayer allowed for me to pause (for at least 60 minutes).
customer_reviews.author: Q. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I eventually bought the newer hd 500 model because after many hours of trying with support and by myself could never get it to recognize my network. Worse still was the need to setup on internet instead of with tv and remote like every other type of device on the planet which was fixed with new hd model.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: SO EASY TO SET UP. I was expecting to jump through hoops to get this thing working, but it was so stupid proof that anybody can figure it out. High Def channels look perfect, but standard def channels don't look so clear. I also bought the $30 Slingplayer Mobile app for my Android phone, and I am very pleased with it. The only problem is that it doesn't work very well in 3G networks - 4G and wifi work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: dgpatel

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: Product worked after a fitful time trying to install. Concept was not new to me since I had one before but this one was one for the books! Short is it required hours to set up. Then it went on the blink. Took more hours with consultant at Sling Media folks. Then it went out completely. Back to Sling Media to help but this time the audia just disappeared. If you are going to sell something you should know something about it. You guys don't. I am getting a replacement from Slingbox but I really should get my money back from Amazon. What a shameful performance!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 months old, and it stops working
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Slingbox, which is quite slick, except that my unit has stopped working after having had it for only 4 months. I called warranty service, and they will replace it with either a new or used unit. I have to say that the prospect of getting a used replacement unit is not very comforting. If a new unit fails within 4 months, how long should I expect that my next unit (possibly used) will last? It would be my view that they should either (i) replace the broken machine with a new one; and/or (ii) offer to extend the warranty for a year (especially if they send me a used unit). I hope that someone is paying attention.
customer_reviews.author: michael moore

customer_reviews.title: It failed after 3 months (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on Feb 20 2012 and it failed before June. It powers on for a few seconds then die. Now I have to deal with the manufacturer. It is a lemon. ---------------Update----------------------------- I went through extensive trouble shooting back in June and Sling Media agreed the product is at defect so they sent me a new box. I got the new box in July but guess what, it is defect again. The sound output from the box does not work this new replacement. I went through troubleshooting again and now they are sending me a new box. They will not refund me. This product has serious quality problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sheng

customer_reviews.title: Great addition if your getting charged for a second receiver from the cable/satellite company
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the slingbox performs well if it's on the same home network. However, streaming your media from an internet connection, other than your home network, requires a lot of patience. The slingbox app lags a lot even with a fast network connection (5 MBPS upload and 30 MBPS download). In the end, Sling media needs to spend more time developing their application and software but long term it's a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Pathik P Shah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've had sling for at least 8 years now and it works great. On the LAN it suits my needs and on WAN it just depends on your network connection. Since Echostar bought out the company the support has been minimal and product development has stalled if you ask me but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We have a cable box and a blu-ray player. Both were very easy to set up and work flawlessly. Inside the network, the quality is extraordinary. Our internet is very slow in its upload, therefore, quality is compromised. Never the less, it works very, very well. To my surprise, I have been able to see my tv on the train and on a car using my android phone. It is a great product that works. It is not cheap. The price should go down, but I got a very good price at Amazon. I recomend both, the Sling HD and buy it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Antonio Morales

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of other people, I loved the Slingbox HD until, one day, it simply would not connect to my network. I checked the web and found out that I am just one of many purchasers who paid a lot of money for something with a high failure rate. Apparently, it is a problem with the capacitors. So, over $200 for the Slingbox HD and another $60 for the iPhone and iPad apps (they actually charge $30 apiece for the two apps) and now I have a worthless piece of junk. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: bojohnson

customer_reviews.title: IT is OK
customer_reviews.text: I had mine for about 6 months and it quit working. Then Sling box was really easy to work with and I got a new one. I do enjoy the quality. The remote lags a bit making it hard to control your TV but overall streaming your TV to you it is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: W. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Please do your homework before you make my mistake.
customer_reviews.text: I used my slingbox for 100-120 days casually. It was a pain to configure, but other than that I had no huge complained. Right after the 90 day warranty period it failed. All lights on the front of the unit blink. They will -not- talk to me unless I give them another 50 dollars for an extended warranty first. The year manufacturer's warranty isn't worth anything. Please, take a look at the overwhelming amount of people with the same issue I'm describing. I will never again give Sling Media money for a product.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Nice customer service, good luck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this through Amazon in April. The Slingbox PRO-HD worked as advertised for approximately 8 weeks and then died. No lights, no throughput. I borrowed a friends power supply from a brand new unit and still no luck. It is toast. So I contact the seller, Circuit City, through the Amazon provided capability. Circuit City tells me to contact Sling Media. Sling Media has not responded to me yet. I feel like when you pay $250 for anything you ought to get more than a canned "Good luck, thanks for playing" email from the seller. Because I am a loyal and frequent Amazon shopper with never a complaint, I guess I was due.
customer_reviews.author: jmac

customer_reviews.title: Even the 90 day support sucks
customer_reviews.text: I have now spent 3 hours talking and chatting with 3 tech support guys. I have run every test and swapped out all my cables and I still have a green tv screen. Something is wrong with the output port on the sling box. Not hard to determine. But now I am expected to wait another 24-48 over the weekend for a upper level tech guy to call me. BTW none of the tech guys made any notes so I had to explain the issues from the start all three times. I am assuming no one has the authority to send out another replacement box. I have had the box for only 4 days now. Fun
customer_reviews.author: mkat404

customer_reviews.title: Still the best model!
customer_reviews.text: Old but still works perfectly for streaming the news ALL DAY while at work.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Boston

customer_reviews.title: Do you have very high speed internet line?
customer_reviews.text: Pro-HD has one digital componet connector, one component connector and TV tuner, that means HD quality connection is limited only one likewise solo model. If you have very high speed broad band in your home and satelite, you may enjoy HD quality, but most of hotels in the US does not have such high speed line. In case you may use within your intranet, it does work excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Masa

customer_reviews.title: My only source of TV.
customer_reviews.text: As an overseas resident, this is my only option for watching TV. I love this product. It would get all 5 stars but for the difficult setup process on both ends. I've used this for 2 years now and only recently learned that the video quality is HD when I watch through Slingbox_dot_com rather than through the SlingPlayer. I do not recommend wasting your time with the SlingPlayer when the quality is HD over their website. This is a great product if you invest the time and money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it died, powers on for about 10 seconds and then all lights go out on it. Only have had this for 3 months. Disappointing to spend so much money on something that only lasts a few months. Should be covered under warranty, working with Slingbox on it, but given a new version only lasted 3 months, not sure how I feel about a refurbished one. Update: Refurbished one died too, Slingbox won't replace it with a new model, only refurbs, this is becoming more trouble than its worth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, AWFUL Customer support
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy setup and usability. My slingbox died after 16 months. OEM's support policy states that they give free tech support for 12 months. After 12 months, you have to pay them $30 to talk to a tech of the phone. Unacceptable. I'll never buy another Slingbox.
customer_reviews.author: rob damiani

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Order from this Company!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slingbox to use while we were living abroad. We installed this at a friends house and used it successfully for about two months, after which the unit suddenly no longer powers on or off, rendering it useless. Conveniently, this occurred just after the "window" for returns or replacements. This unit was expensive, and I am completely convinced that it was a defective unit and was rebuilt and repackaged before we received it. My requests for a replacement have gone unanswered. These people basically stole our money. I would never purchase anything from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Angelini

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox HDPro
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. I attend college and watch TV on my computer or phone during my free time. It would be nice if more than one user was able to log on at a time. I would like for other family members to be able to watch the big game on their phone the same time I do. Overall I rate it 5 stars because it does exactly what the box says it does.
customer_reviews.author: tupps

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love my Slingbox. I have travelled to France and Africa and if I have internet I can watch my programs that I have DVR'd. I highly recommend if you plan on doing some extensive travel and want to be able to watch your favorite programs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lemley

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to but setup required an awful ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to but setup required an awful lot of fooling around. It needs to be rebooted a lot, too, which stinks because it's 100 miles away from where I want to watch it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hinty

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used my SlingBox going down the freeway watching the MLB playoffs, in my back yard, at the park, anywhere. No more missed ball games. I even used it while in Hawaii and I live in California. Now I don't leave home without it. RS
customer_reviews.author: Randy S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Allows us to watch local sports team games while we are away from our home base. We use it at our winter vacation home. As long as you have good internet access at both ends, will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox Pro HD - Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Slingbox products for the past 5 years, and recently stepped up to the Slingbox Pro HD. I am pleased to report that this Slingbox exceeded my expectations. The installation process was easy (I am fairly technical, however), and the product works as described. I've had the new Sling installed for over a month now, with absolutely zero issues. I'm able to access the Sling on my iPad, Android phone, iMac desktop and PC. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Yep That Is Me

customer_reviews.title: I've had some scares where i thought it broke, ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had some scares where i thought it broke, but it was the power adapter. I've replaced it four times.
customer_reviews.author: Marc K.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect. never choppy even over dsl (dsl down, cable up). my computer has perfect hd quality and as small picture also. owned since they first came out, a few minor minor quirks, not even gonna mention them. still using today. love it. best investment i have ever made
customer_reviews.author: fred here

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox Pro-HD
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture quality when used on your own home network, loses some quality when using over the net and no HD on a MAC. Still a good product over all. I had some problems configuring it because my router had some ports that were blocked, I called costumer support and they fixed the problem in 2 min. Excellent customer support!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in Fl. from Pa. Just hoping that I would some kind of picture.Well I was very pleased with the sling box. Not only do we have a good picture in Fl. we to our Son's home in Ohio. I wanted to let him see how it worked. We watched our home team play football. He likes the sling catcher as well. If you are going somewhere away from home this is a way to watch your local TV. Great product.You will need the sling catcher to go along with the box to complete the system.
customer_reviews.author: Fred W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The slingbox is one of the gadgets that i use the most. Setup is easy, just plug the power, the Ethernet and run the setup in one of the computers of your network. i watch all the champions league matches at my office, controlling my tv (that is 10 miles away) from the internet. play, pause, rewind, ff... i can do all of them using the virtual remote that appears in my screen, or locally in the included software the only cons is that i dont know what the usb port is for, i guess there will be a firmware update that will allow watch movies, or listen to music files stored in a hard drive, but not yet
customer_reviews.author: Carlosph20

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, works well over WiFi local, WiFi remote and 3G. Adjusts video quality to match connection speed. Setup is a little cryptic plus I was over thinking the install. Does require firewall/router port forwarding for remote connection. Purchased unit at Amazon and received it next day using Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Not happy........:(
customer_reviews.text: I had the Slingbox HD Pro. It went down after 3 months. Returned it for a partial refund. Decided to give it another try. 2nd one went down after 1.5 months. I will be returning it, also. There seems to be an issue with these, and I will not recommend them to anyone. I believe what everyone is saying. Not a well built product.
customer_reviews.author: rcdaddio

customer_reviews.title: I own three
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and usability. I could not be more pleased, I have to pay for cable so I want ultimate flexability and accessability to get the most from my service. Thank you Sling box!
customer_reviews.author: David Sandbeck

customer_reviews.title: Love it!, Best slingbox ever.
customer_reviews.text: You get the best TV everywhere in the world with this Slingbox. I use it daily and it never crashes, it needs absolutely no attention from me, ever. I plugged it in months ago and have never done anything else to configure it. It just works everytime I need to watch TV on my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Gian Paulo Virzi

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: I realy like my sling box. I'm im mexico and can watch everything I watched in the states. its a little slow changing chanels, but the picture is great as well as the sound. I'm not one of these teckno geeks,so I cant give you a whole lot of tec advice. so I'll just say I think its the best thing to come along since toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: gotit

customer_reviews.title: My home TV, on my iPad, anywhere in the World
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ages ago, and I still use it to watch programs from my TV wherever I am in the world. Even when I'm in the UK to watch the soccer on my iPad I can just connect and stream. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Romenoff

customer_reviews.title: This is so good !!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the 'Sony Location Free' device at first, never worked. I got this 'Slingbox Pro HD' and it worked right out of the box. Had it up and running in ten minutes. Took my PC out of town and accessed the device with no problems. I was able to change channels easly, set up my DVR to record a future movie form my PC easly. The remote on the screen works just like the one at home. I have my home DVD player (second devise) hooked up and running too. I work out of town a lot and this really is like sitting in my own home with my home TV channels. You got to get one !!
customer_reviews.author: Captain On Camano

customer_reviews.title: The unit I bought...
customer_reviews.text: ...worked for about a month and went dead on me. I believe the internal network card burnt out. Sure was not worth my investment. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jonny J.

customer_reviews.title: This Delivers
customer_reviews.text: This may be the easiest way to get your Satellite/Cable on the go. The quality is a function of the speed of your internet connections. With 3mb DSL, I am gettig a very good HD away from home and on my laptops at home. The cellphone application works great too. When connection speeds slow, it will optimize to cut the quality to the best supported by your speed. The only problem was the slingbox application would not load on one of my older laptops.
customer_reviews.author: P. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought the HD player over the SD because of the 'built in tuner' function. After purchasing I learned you don't have access to your DVR if you're avoiding conflict with at-home-viewers. The reason is in order to avoid conflict you must use the coax-cable directly from the wall, therefore losing the functionality you get from connecting to the back of a DVR/PVR system. This is my only complaint. I love the system and with the help of customer service people I was able to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Buy New
customer_reviews.text: Yeah so apperently refurbished from this seller gets you 5 months of a working box.
customer_reviews.author: Elton Marvin Jr

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Slingboxes are a must have device for the frequent traveler. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to watch their home channels anywhere, anytime with a data connection.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device
customer_reviews.text: With this Sling Box I can travel in my RV and watch any TV program I have subscribed to at home. No need to have a cable subscription in Florida and pay for duplicate service. Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Zollo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent option for remote viewing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution for remote viewing. I recently visited Korea for a couple of weeks and did not want to miss some football games. The Slingbox did the job. I was able to watch the games and the quality was very good considering I was in a remote part of Korea with only wireless access to the internet. In the states, I am able to watch my tv while traveling. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allen

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this expected average results. Reading other reviews, they all said to expect a little more than You Tube quality video if watching outside of the LAN where the box is attached. While it does require a pretty fast connection, I have watched this from numerous different locations and the picture quality is unreal. I highly recommend this product to everyone. I have already convinced two of my friends to by them for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: My original slingbox from 6 years ago still works fine this giant pile of crap new version is already broken... I saw the warnings but still purchased out of necessity, luckily I purchased the extended warranty through Amazon... my guess is in the 4 year life of the warranty I will be getting LOTS of new slinboxes. shame.
customer_reviews.author: Koray Ahmet

customer_reviews.title: Defective Sling
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for less than a couple of months the thing stopped working. All I get is a clicking sound. Its less than a year old, wtf. When it worked or when i rarely used it, it seemed to work fine. However if you have a slow upload speed quality is very limited, less than 480 p. I'm trying to figure out how to get this thing fixed. Defective product
customer_reviews.author: Just Because

customer_reviews.title: LOW quality on Iphone and IPAD
customer_reviews.text: With Apple's upgrade to iOS 6, the Slingbox has lost its ability to play auto and high quality video to the iPAD and iphone. The captive LOW quality video is barely watchable. No technical response from Sling team for weeks. Stay away from this product for use with Apple products until they get their house in order! See Slingbox forums iPad, iPhone iOS 6 for more information...
customer_reviews.author: Broadcaster

customer_reviews.title: great video product
customer_reviews.text: The product is better than I originally expected. It adjusts the video quality according to your internet upload speed. To get a smoothly video, you'd better to have >1M upload speed. I can also watch the video from my blackberry phone. However, the player on blackberry is only free-trial for 30 days. I will suggest this project to my friends who have similar request.
customer_reviews.author: I-hua Chuang

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox is awesome...
customer_reviews.text: I bought my slingbox to watch the NBA playoffs while I was out of country. It has worked out really well. The only thing to consider is the quality of your internet connections. Most hotels have pretty decent downstream, but make sure you have plenty of upstream at home! Once I upgraded my upload capacity at home, I was able to watch fullscreen NBA action on my laptop and it even controls my DVR perfectly! If you're on the road, you gotta have a slingbox to keep up with local programming...
customer_reviews.author: John Michael Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: When my old one died after many years, I was afraid I couldn't find another. I needed the RCA hookups so I could connect my security cameras for remote viewing. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff1039

customer_reviews.title: Best product of its class
customer_reviews.text: I have now two slingboxes and I'm happy with them. Very reliable, nice quality although it would have been great that it supported 1080, but overall I'm really satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Work`s Great
customer_reviews.text: Took little doing to get it going ,because it is a old model and not listed online.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Error 202 !!
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for 8 months Then error 202 over and over. Sling tech support is horrible. This problem seemes to have began around Nov. 2010. Go check slings support forums for google search Sling error 202. I am not alone and hate I have lost my 300 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Surfnet

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this part. I can now wake up in any city in the US and watch my home news and sports. This is a great item that I should have owned sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up and use!
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews, in particular the nay Sayers. Happy to report the unit is as promised: easy to set up, easy to use. Lack of HDMI support an inconvenience not a deal breaker. I hooked up the Slingbox to secondary cable box using supplied component cables. Image quality on both laptop and iPad2 very impressive. Technically not HD, but I can't see difference. Love the unit so far!
customer_reviews.author: Howard F. Jeger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for just over a year and I have to say it is very convenient. We watch TV when we are away on laptops, iPads, and computers. It's a real cool item.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy O

customer_reviews.title: great offer for past models
customer_reviews.text: With the newer SlingBoxes® not being compatible with previous SlingPlayer® apps for PC viewing, its great to still have access to purchase units that will work with older players/mobile devices. Thanks to the seller for making this product available!!
customer_reviews.author: sjsharksfan

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this product a month ago and had it installed in minutes. It does everything as advertised and works great. I bought this to utilize my Direct TV connection at my lake home while I'm on the road, and now I can use it to finally get rid of Comcast at home! The Sling Box will pay for itself in a couple of months. I highly recommed this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Westin

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox
customer_reviews.text: Well this is a really amazing product. This is for anyone who wants their TV programs portable. You can watch the news sports or HBO any where in the world on our own computer. Why pay a premium in a hotel to see a movie or catch up on local news. Just open your computer anywhere in the work with internet access and get caught up. You can even watch in your own home in a room that does not have a TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for years without the needless features of the 500.
customer_reviews.author: BruceTman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can watch my own tv with all the cable channels anywhere on my iPad or iPhone
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: it is great.
customer_reviews.text: it took a while to get it working, but once it worked, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tool to watch TV anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I could set up the equipment in Japan. It was an easy installation. Now I'm able to watch Japanese TV programs in the U.S. The quality is also good. The only thing I disappointed is that a HDD player was not supported. So I can't use all functions of the player. I can't schedule the video record... The player is new and popular in Japan. So I hope it'll be supported soon.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroshi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. This product was exactly what I was looking for at agreat price. It was described correctly and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Maury Fisher

customer_reviews.title: The reason for the four star was because I had to send the main unit back because it lost power.
customer_reviews.text: everything about it I liked. I did not dislike anything. I don't think it is wireless but that would be a good feature.
customer_reviews.author: rick christianson

customer_reviews.title: best unit ever made
customer_reviews.text: works great but as an other unit it gets real hot and may be using lots of electric power, i putting it on a timer when not using tv.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Sling Media Slingbox PRO-HD SB300-100 (Old Version)
product_meta.description:
Take your entire HD home theater with you wherever you go with the Slingbox PRO-HD. Connect to multiple A/V devices and tune into your favorite TV shows, sporting events, and special programming in stunning, true-to-life 1080i high definition. The PRO-HD gives you the same features and ease of use as the Slingbox SOLO, plus a high-quality HD viewing experience-anywhere in the world. Easily connect up to three of your home-theater devices to the PRO-HD and take your entire entertainment center with you-on your desktop, Mac, laptop, tablet, or mobile phone.What's in the box: Sling Media Slingbox PRO-HD Internet TV Broadcaster, AC Adapter (100-120VAC, 50-60Hz), Ethernet Cable, Coaxial Cable, Composite AV Cable, Component Video Cable, Remote Control IR Cable, S-Video Cable, Stereo Audio Cable, Quick Start Guide and 1-Year Limited Warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


SLINGBOX TURNS YOUR PC, MAC, TABLET OR SMARTPHONE INTO A TV.
 Tune in to your favorite shows, sporting events and special programming in stunning, true-to-life 1080i high-definition (HD). Change channels, browse the program guide, and set your DVR with an on-screen remote control that looks just like the one you have at home. The Slingbox PRO-HD easily connects to up to three of your A/V sources so you can take your entire entertainment center with you—on your PC, Mac, tablet or smartphone*. 

EASILY CONNECT EVERYTHING
 Connect one HD video source, one standard-definition (SD) video source, and one coaxial source and watch anywhere. 

TAKE CONTROL
 Take complete control of your home theater via the web with the comprehensive and easy-to-use on-screen remote control and program guide. 

TUNE IN TO 1080I HD
 Watch your favorite shows in stunning HD over the Internet on your PC or Mac desktop or laptop—from anywhere. 

NO MONTHLY FEES
 Watch and control your TV and its programming on your PC, Mac, tablet or smartphone with no monthly subscription fee.* 

 *Download sold separately. Additional fees from your mobile provider may apply. Picture quality depends on network speed. 

CONNECTIONS
GETTING STARTED WITH SLINGBOX PRO-HD IS SIMPLE
 1. Connect the Slingbox to up to three A/V sources, such as a DVR, a cable set-top box and a DVD player/recorder (The Slingbox is compatible with just about any A/V source.)
 2. Connect the Slingbox to your home network (If your router is too far from your Slingbox for a direct connection, use the SlingLink TURBO or another Ethernet bridge for connectivity.)
 3. Fire up your home network-connected PC or Mac computer, complete the Slingbox setup, and enjoy your very own home theater on your PC, Mac, tablet, or smartphone.

WHAT DEVICES CAN I CONNECT?
 * Basic Cable TV Set-Top Box or Digital Cable Set-Top Box
 * DVRs (such as DISH, TiVo, Comcast, ReplayTV or one provided by your cable/satellite provider)
 * DVD Player/Recorder
 * Satellite Receiver such as DISH or DIRECTV
 * Video/Security Camera
 * Windows Media Center
 * Digital Antenna
 * Digital Cable (clear QAM)
 * HD Component Input Support for 720p or 1080i (60Hz)

WHAT DO I NEED TO WATCH ON MY LAPTOP?
 Watch and control your TV directly from Slingbox.com. Using Firefox, Internet Explorer or Safari, you have complete access to your Slingbox and its connected cable box, satellite receiver or DVR. You get a virtual remote control as well as a searchable TV guide—all without downloading or installing desktop software. 

VIRTUAL PROGRAM GUIDE AND REMOTE CONTROL
 View all of your television programming with the virtual program guide. With the on-screen remote control, change channels, pause, fast-forward or rewind and set up DVR recordings. 

POPUP VIDEO PLAYER
 Multitask while watching your TV, or if you prefer, watch your TV in full-screen mode. 

PC AND MAC SUPPORT
 Access your Slingbox from any high-speed Internet-connected PC or Mac laptop or desktop. 

WHAT DO I NEED TO WATCH ON MY TABLET OR SMARTPHONE?
 With SlingPlayer software (sold separately) watch your TV and all of its programming on your iPad, iPhone, BlackBerry, Android phone, Android tablet, Windows Phone, Palm OS or Symbian smartphones. 

FULL CONTROL OF YOUR HOME TV
 Control your programming with easy-to-use menus and shortcuts on either a touch screen or navigational interface. Easily change your TV channels, navigate program guides and schedule recordings on your DVR. 

EASY ACCESS TO A WIDE RANGE OF DEVICES AND PROGRAMS
 Control your digital cable box, satellite receiver, DVR or DVD player. Access music channels or video on demand. 

HIGH-QUALITY VIEWING MODES
 Enjoy stunning full-screen video. Switch to audio-only mode to save bandwidth or battery life. Adjust the video display size or aspect ratio. (Audio-only mode and adjustable video display size are only supported on select devices.) 

TAKE ADVANTAGE OF HIGH-SPEED MOBILE INTERNET CONNECTIVITY
 Access your television programming over a high-speed 3G, 4G or Wi-Fi connection. (Check your mobile device and service for supported connectivity options. Some Android phones and tablets support 4G connections. The iPod touch only supports Wi-Fi connections.)
feature_bullets: Streams High Definition video Around the house or over the Internet (requires minimum 1.5mbps upload)
